name: David Marler
text: this place is great enough just on pricing .but its so great to go to a place and they show there belief in the lord by there actions and the way they treat others. my metal for my house was so unreliable cheap but they treated me like I was a very important customer .I was amazed. and will never shop anywhere else or recommend

name: Sonya Buchanan
text: Undecided on what color metal I wanted for my new roof, Zack offered to mail me a samples to help me decide. Fast shipping and great customer service helping me decide and pay over the phone. I appreciate the kindness and respectful tone he presented to a undecided first time homeowner. Thank you Zack!

name: Debora McCutcheon
text: Do not do business with the guys!!! They take your money and don’t finish the job!!! We’ve been waiting over a year now. And they will not respond to phone calls.  Terrible customer service!!

resp.text: Deborah, My name is Zac Smith and I am the owner of Agcor. Please call me at the office on Monday. I have never heard of you before but I will be glad to see what the issue is. My personal email address is zsmith@agcorsteel.com. I am sure I can get to the bottom of it in a few minutes.

name: Innovative Fence Solutions Cullman, AL
text: Great place to deal with. Best prices around and good customer service.

name: Tim Chambers
text: Great working environment and great benefits.

name: Robert allan
text: It’s sad to see an Company that shows favoritism as well as neglect To OSHA rules as well they Have machines that Leak oil no lights on them no safety guards an well say your the on safe one here

name: Evan Brock
text: Great place to do business. Owners are great people and they'll get you what you need.

name: Kevin Gaskin
text: Great group of people, easy going to get unloaded

name: shawn hudson
text: First time customer, shorted one sheet called and told them I would be there the next day to pick up.  Was told it would be ready by Zack, the owner.  Got there the next day and material was not ready, waited 30 minutes to get it cut.  Climb up on the roof to finish my job only to find the sheet is 3 inches too long.  Not the best experience.   The quality of the metal was good, service, Not so much.

name: James Glimpse
text: outstanding products. Agcor Steel produces top grade steel buildings. We are working to build a shop with living quarters. A dream come true.

name: Dean Mangum
text: They built a pole barn for me. They did everything they said they would...and more. Good folks to deal with.

name: Vinemont Welding
text: Great people and great pricing

name: Dike Moss
text: Best place in Cullman to get metal roofing and complete pole barn kits.   Price and quality are tops here.

name: Thomas Sears
text: The people at the store are nice, but the online ordering is terrible. Got the wrong number of bolts the first time, then they sent a replacement bolt and it was missing the nut, so I had to go buy that separately. Won't order from Fastenal again

name: Scott Moss
text: The young lady behind the counter is helpful and great. Their online ordering and pick up in the stores is disorganized and terrible.

name: Alexa Wiley
text: Very helpful! David went above and beyond to help my mom and I find some odd sized bolts we were looking for!

name: Kelly Falter
text: Not sure what the previous review was referring to about high prices.  I have been buying fasteners from them for a few years now.  They are a fraction of the price of Home Depot or Lowe's and if they don't have what you need, they can usually get it in house within a day or so.

name: Bolt Movers
text:
Fastenal, a company with 2,683 stores CANNOT give you refund except for the store that you purchased the product at.

Because there computer system does not communicate with any of the other stores.

Unfortunately the product was purchased out of town and now I will need to drive 4 hours to get the $98 dollar refund for the screws that were purchased.

Keep in mind it is 2019. I could FaceTime with Ariana Grande across the country at a moments notice, she just never answers my calls.

name: Walter Rice
text: Great staff great selection

name: Jessica Reece
text: There are no prices posted on anything and instead of allowing me to just look around while my husband looked for a fastener he specifically needed, I was followed like I was some criminal. We left without buying anything because the price was more than triple what is in their website. Ridiculous to treat people like criminals and then try to rob us.

name: Adan Aguillon
text: Highly-qualified and recomended, I get all fastener I need on these place, excelence service🤩

resp.text: Thank you Adan for your recommendation!

name: Sharon Davis
text: Our company (J.R. Hoe & Sons) has been doing business with Huntsville Fastener for many, many years.  The salesmen are the best at what they do.  Vince Anderson is one of the most helpful, friendly and knowledgeable people in the fastener industry.  A great business to do business with !!!

resp.text: Sharon, we thank you for trusting us to handle your fastener business.

name: Tracy Zilkofski
text: Excellent supplier. Vince is very helpful and provides quotes, order acknowledgements very quickly. Any issues are taken care of promptly

resp.text: Thank you Tracy! We enjoy doing business with you.

text: did not tell me over the phone that there was a $25 minimum drove an hour away to get a dollar nut and washer and was turned away

resp.text: We usually address our order min over the phone when customers call so they know before they visit us.I am sorry for the inconvenience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

name: Ray Barnett
text: We have been using this supplier for many years.  We have never had a problem with the products or service.

resp.text: Thank you for your business Ray!

name: Jeff Greatek
text: These guys really know fasteners, glad I called and will continue to do so when I need bolts.

name: David Patey
text: Great service and pricing

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to do business with our company!

name: Julius Thomas
text: The new facility we just opened is amazing. We know can supply are customers with all their needs faster and more efficiently. With 2 warehouses. Please come and experience the full services we have to offer.

name: Steve Reeners
text: Great bunch of people.  Hundreds if not thousands of products. And if they don't have it, they will step up to the plate and find it for you. Great service got what I needed delivered in most cases less than 24 hours.

name: Shirley Parker
text: Great friendly service

name: Danny Roberts
text: They were out of a desperately needed product but called all locations even competitors to find a supply thanks

name: Allen Douglass
text: fast friendly service

name: ConstructNoden
text: Great team

name: LUCIO PEREZ
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good service

(Original)
Muy buen servicio

name: Thomas Christensen
text: I'm glad I found this place. A great place for home improvement projects.

name: Eric Martin
text: Friendly service.

name: Eddie Gifford
text: This is an excellent hardware store and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The only reason for the 4 star is because they aren't open on Saturdays.

name: Sean Perry
text: The employees there were polite and even enjoyable. The lumber smelled nice, store was clean and had a unique selection as well  as the common

name: Joey Walden
text: Never had a bad experience there. People always helpful

name: Eddie
text: Always helpful with whatever project large or small. They have better quality than box stores and good customer service.

name: Adam Ashley
text: Great products and exceptional service

name: Larry Hearn
text: Because they have all the materials i need.

name: Rickeyt Petty
text: Great place

name: Michael Nance
text: Good place

name: Ry Duk
text: Awesome

name: Luke Dunkling
text: By far the best company and Employer I've ever worked for !!! Good Christian company and great work ethics...

name: Gi Vi
text: Friendly, fast unload

name: Baoo Jee
text: Fast unloading, place to park and there is a nearby Loves Truck Stop.

name: Amandeep Nanuan
text:
Nice works
Fast unlocked 30_45 min
Receiving Time 7am to 2 pm(AL)

name: Jai Singh
text: Good people. 30 minutes max, you’ll be out of there.

name: Zac Lott
text: Excellent staff and competitive pricing . These guys are spot on with information and delivery times. The store and warehouse has everything you need to get the job done!

name: Ramil Mukhamedov
text: We are a dispatching company and one of our carriers was an hour late on a Friday. We thought we where stuck there for the weekend. But the owner himself called everyone up and went out of his way to get this truck unloaded even though it was past their working hours. If you are unloading here, you are lucky! Great people.

name: Sherzod Hudoyberdiev
text: Very fast loading

name: dave Reynolds
text: Not bad receiver nice guy and fast ya it’s a little tight but not to bad , slow and steady , looks worse than it is once you start rolling

name: MARK SAMPA
text:
Fast unloading . Docks between the buildings are for Full Load only. If you deliver few skids go in the front . Pass the brown building and on the end of that  there is 4 Docks. That belong to Fastening Solution.
Good luck

name: Stanley Mills
text: Very good experience as always. I LOVE Fastening Solutions and have been using them for years.

name: Steve Lee
text: Well if u have a long wheelbases truck and a 53 foot box get ready for a littlw fun and prepare to just sit jack knifed in the door. Best way in is the red light just passed the place if coming west on selma hwy (us80) and make left hand turn in and pull out towards highway to back in through the gate . Good luck but good people and can park overnight in the front along curb and they will come get u first thing in morning at 0800.

name: 89vainius
text: Im giving a bad review to the previous commenter lol. The dock between the buildings is for deliveries only. And easy to back the way he described it.

name: Big R 504
text: They load and unload ok but the old dock in the back is a pain in the @$& to back into! You also have to back down the driveway. Good luck 53ft'ers👍

name: Tauseef Siddiqui
text: Good job
